text_orgStatusMgmtProfileLevel.redInfo: profile status is red if atleast one of the sections in profile is red
text_orgStatusMgmtProfileLevel.greenInfo: profile status is green only if all the sections in profile are green
text_orgStatusMgmtProfileLevel.yellowInfo: profile status is yellow if atleast one of the sections in profile is yellow

bottomHeading: editing any of above rules will override following betterplace verification rules
